Note.Content: NJPS NRSV REB "head" (of person) | RSV NIV NJB CEV ESV "head" (of valley)
RSV NIV NRSV NJB REB GNT ESV | MT HOTTP-C {L:מְרַאֲשֹׁות<SDBH:מְרַאֲשֹׁות>} | NJPS "diadems"
RSV NJB NRSV ESV "head" (of person? or leader?) | NIV GNT "leader" CEV "ruler" | NJPS "roof"

LEXSense.DefinitionShort: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
literally: head; hence: = the point in time at which an event starts happening
literally: (one's) head is lifted up; hence: = state in which humans can look up without shame

Glosses.Gloss: one's head is lifted up > to look up with confidence

LEXSense.DefinitionShort: literally: to lift up (one's) head; hence: = action by which humans look up without shame

Glosses.Gloss: to lift up (one's) head > to look up with confidence

LEXSense.DefinitionShort: literally: to lift up (someone else's) head; hence: = causative action by which deities cause humans to be able to look up without shame

Glosses.Gloss: to lift up (someone's head) > to cause (someone) to look up with confidence

LEXSense.DefinitionShort: literally: to lift up (one's) head; hence: = action by which nations still have the ability to engage themselves in a military conflict with others, ◄ as someone who can still lift up his head after having been beaten down
literally: to lift up (someone's) head; hence: = causative action by which humans declare other humans free after having held them prisoner
literally: head; hence: = the total number of a range of events
= literally: head; hence: = state in which products have a quality that is superior to anything else
literally: head; hence: = state in which an event reachest its highest level of intensity
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
literally: head; hence: = the topmost part of a vertically oriented object, such as a mountain, and the principal part of an horizontally oriented object, such as a street or a bed
literally: head; hence: = a sub division of a larger unit that is divided into multiple parts
literally: head; hence: = the total number of a group of objects or people
exact meaning unsure; possibly: = a poisonous plant sometimes found in the furrows of a field; ◄ Hyoscyamus reticulatus (Veined henbane)
= poisonous fluid, ◄ produced from poisonous plants or secreted by serpents; ≈ here used to denote suffering and injury
